Achievements.Name: Thief
Achievements.Description: In Episode I steal Jones' gun without alarming him.

Achievements.Name: Boxer
Achievements.Description: In Episode II use correctly 5 combos fighting with looters.

Achievements.Name: Gunfighter
Achievements.Description: In Episode III kill 10 enemies using Concentration Mode.

Achievements.Name: Archer
Achievements.Description: In Episode IV kill 10 enemies using bow.

Achievements.Name: Driver
Achievements.Description: In Episode V kill 5 enemies when driving the coal cart.

Achievements.Name: Hatman
Achievements.Description: In Episode VI shoot 6 hats off from enemies' heads.

Achievements.Name: Slayer
Achievements.Description: In Episode VII defeat 6 enemies using the whip.

Achievements.Name: Accurate guy
Achievements.Description: In Episode VIII kill McLyde brothers with 2 bullets only.

Achievements.Name: Untouchable
Achievements.Description: Finish Episode IX without taking a scratch.

Achievements.Name: Horseman
Achievements.Description: In Episode X kill 7 enemies while in the saddle.

Achievements.Name: Archeologist
Achievements.Description: Finish Episode XI in less than 10 minutes.

Achievements.Name: Spider hunter
Achievements.Description: In Episode XII kill 10 spiders using the whip.

Achievements.Name: Fire Raiser
Achievements.Description: In Episode XIII kill 3 enemies using fire.

Achievements.Name: Eagles Eye
Achievements.Description: In Episode XIV kill 10 enemies by shooting them in the head with the sniper rifle.

Achievements.Name: Bow Expert
Achievements.Description: In Episode XV kill 10 enemies by shooting them in the head with the bow.

Achievements.Name: Earthquake
Achievements.Description: Playing as Miner kill 4 enemies with a single dynamite stick.

Achievements.Name: Lucy's lullaby
Achievements.Description: Playing as Miner kill 3 enemies with a single shot from the sawn-off shotgun.

Achievements.Name: Quicker than hell
Achievements.Description: Playing as Gunslinger shoot 4 enemies using the quickshooters in less than 10 seconds.

Achievements.Name: Demolition
Achievements.Description: Playing as Gunslinger keep at 100% killing efficiency for X dynamite stick throws.

Achievements.Name: Headhunter
Achievements.Description: Playing as Sniper score 5 headshots in a row.

Achievements.Name: Blind Killer
Achievements.Description: Playing as Sniper kill 5 enemies with the sniper rifle without using the scope.

Achievements.Name: Surefire hand
Achievements.Description: Playing as Rifleman shoot 5 enemies using the rifle without reloading.

Achievements.Name: Rifle Expert
Achievements.Description: Playing as Rifleman keep 100% rifle efficiency for 10 shots.

Achievements.Name: Bounty Hunter
Achievements.Description: All Wanted posters found.

Achievements.Name: Gun Collector
Achievements.Description: All bonus weapons found.

Achievements.Name: Story Mode finished
Achievements.Description: Story Mode finished.

Achievements.Name: Very Hard Mode finished
Achievements.Description: Story Mode finished on Very Hard difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Long distance
Achievements.Description: A distance of 10 miles covered.

Achievements.Name: Westman
Achievements.Description: Played for more than 24 hours.

Achievements.Name: BonusLevelsFinished
Achievements.Description: All bonus levels finished.

Achievements.Name: Duel Challenge finished
Achievements.Description: Duel Challenge finished.

Achievements.Name: Young god
Achievements.Description: 6 bullets dodged in duels.

Achievements.Name: Fireworker
Achievements.Description: 10 dynamites shot mid-air.

Achievements.Name: Religious Man
Achievements.Description: 44 enemies confused by reading the bible.

Achievements.Name: Legend of the Wild West
Achievements.Description: 300 enemies killed in Multiplayer.

Achievements.Name: Killing machine
Achievements.Description: 20 enemies killed in Multiplayer without dying.
